thread.title: Photos: Massive Protests Across Bay Area and Sacramento Following Trump Inauguration
thread.title_full: Photos: Massive Protests Across Bay Area and Sacramento Following Trump Inauguration

author: KQED News Staff
title: Photos: Massive Protests Across Bay Area and Sacramento Following Trump Inauguration
text:
More than 100,000 demonstrators around the Bay Area and Sacramento joined over 1 million people in Women’s Marches and protests across the United States on Saturday, rallying against President Donald J. Trump, particularly on issues of women’s rights.
The marches paralleled the massive Women’s March on Washington , …read more 
Source:: Arts News
